room_title: Escape room "Doomsday Bomber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
review: Did the Doomsday Bomber room. It was difficult but so much fun! We broke out with a little time left. It was a wonderful time! Sam was such a fun game master!

room_title: Escape room "Doomsday Bomber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
review: We went as a family and had a blast, or rather not a blast as we diffused the bomb and saved the world!Staff is very friendly and helpful as we were new to escape rooms, decor is nice and sets the mood, and the room we did had challenging puzzles and clues and was very detailed.It was great to see our family work together as a team and each display their own set of skills, everyone was able to contribute all the way down to the 9-year-old who solved our very first challenge!Made a great vacation memory for sure and we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Doomsday Bomber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
review: We did the Doomsday Bomber and beat it with 33.18 seconds left. The game set up was great and very immersive. It was like being in a Nancy Drew game!

room_title: Escape room "Doomsday Bomber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
review: Our family of 7 adults and 1 child (10 years old) completed the Doomsday Bomber room! Although this is one of their more difficult rooms, we escaped with 5 minutes remaining. The game was very fun and challenging, and our game master, Paige, was awesome! We would definitely go back and do other rooms. If youâ€™re looking for something to do with a group, I highly recommend!
